about.description: I'm from Tucuman, Argentina. When I started college, I signed up for Systems Engineering in order to understand and learn more about the IT world. Being convinced that programming was what I wanted to focus on, I decided to steer my life in that direction and graduated from a bootcamp as a full-stack developer. I'm a programmer looking for a team where I can learn and put all my knowledge into practice, gain experience and grow professionally in this career.

projects.Movye: Web application to search movies, order and filter them. It also allows to add movies to favorites and watchlist. Technologies: Next.js and styled components.
projects.Arthub: E-commerce for selling art. Developed alongside a team, using the scrum methodology. Technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize, Firebase, PostgreSQL and authentication with JWT.
projects.Memotest: Classic memory game, with the possibility of choosing 2 themes. Technologies: typescript and styled components
projects.PI - Dogs: Full-stack individual project. It's an application that shows information about every dog breed. It's also possible to create new ones. Technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize and PostgreSQL.
projects.App-Clima: Web application made with React. Look up the weather information of any city in the world.
